Title: Bateau Neckline Lace Bodice Evening Dress

----

Sku: CR718

----

Price: 

----

Saleprice: 

----

Bulkdiscount: 0

----

Sizes: 18, 12, 14, 8, 16, 6, 10

----

Colors: black

----

Category: evening, mob

----

Featured-image: CR718-black-bateau-neckline-lace-bodice-evening-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: A capped sleeved bodice with lace applique and beading creating a floral pattern. The sheer neckline is adorned with lace applique and sequins. The waistline is belted with a satin sash and the peplum has a scalloped lace edge. There is an oval cut out in the back and the floor length skirt falls into a court train.
